channel.title: apartment on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in apartment on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Door code
item.description: This electronic device you are seeing in the picture is nothing but a door code of our apartment where using a scroll buttons one has to search and select the name and then press “appel” means “call” button which will give a ring to the concerned persons apartment and it is that habitué who will answer that call & unlock the main door. Certain buildings will have only code with rarely names on front doors so without “Le code” you won’t get past the outer door which usually leads to a small inner courtyard or a stairway.
